name: Tarteel AI
description: Tarteel AI is an AI-powered Quran memorization app that provides real-time recitation feedback and progress tracking for Muslims worldwide.
longDescription: Tarteel AI is an innovative platform designed to assist Muslims in memorizing and reciting the Quran using advanced artificial intelligence and speech recognition technology. Founded in 2019, the company aims to make Quranic learning accessible and effective by offering real-time feedback on recitation accuracy. The app serves both beginners and advanced learners, helping them improve pronunciation, memorize verses, and track their progress seamlessly. By leveraging AI, Tarteel eliminates the need for constant teacher supervision, making it a valuable tool for self-paced learning. Its mission is to strengthen users' connection with the Quran through technology, with over 9 million users globally benefiting from its features. The platform is available on multiple devices, ensuring accessibility for a diverse audience.
features: Voice Search allows users to find any Quranic verse by reciting or speaking a few words, simplifying navigation and study.
Real-Time Recitation Feedback uses AI to detect mistakes in pronunciation and tajweed, helping users improve their recitation accuracy.
Progress Tracking provides detailed analytics on memorization and recitation goals, enabling users to monitor their Quranic journey.
Recitation Follow-Along syncs with the user’s recitation in real-time, supporting seamless memorization and revision.
Ad-Free Experience ensures uninterrupted focus during Quran study, even in the free version of the app.
Multiple Qari Options let users choose their preferred reciter to listen to, enhancing the learning experience.
Sync Across Devices keeps user progress updated across phones, tablets, and other platforms for consistent learning.
Customizable Notifications remind users to recite specific surahs, such as Surah Al-Kahf on Fridays, to maintain consistency.

faqs.question: What is Tarteel AI?
faqs.answer: Tarteel AI is an app that uses artificial intelligence to help Muslims memorize and recite the Quran with real-time feedback and progress tracking.

faqs.question: Is Tarteel AI free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tarteel AI offers a free version with core features like voice search and recitation follow-along, though some advanced features require a premium subscription.

faqs.question: Does Tarteel AI detect tajweed mistakes?
faqs.answer: The premium version includes mistake detection for pronunciation and tajweed, but this feature is not available in the free plan.

faqs.question: What devices is Tarteel AI available on?
faqs.answer: Tarteel AI is available on iOS, Android, and web platforms, with progress syncing across all devices.

faqs.question: How does the voice search feature work?
faqs.answer: Users can recite or speak a few words from a verse, and Tarteel’s AI instantly locates the corresponding Quranic verse.

faqs.question: Can Tarteel AI help with Quran memorization?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tarteel AI supports memorization through real-time feedback, progress tracking, and recitation follow-along features.

faqs.question: Does Tarteel AI require an internet connection?
faqs.answer: A stable internet connection is required for voice features and real-time feedback to function properly.

faqs.question: Is Tarteel AI suitable for non-Arabic speakers?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tarteel AI supports non-Arabic speakers with translations and pronunciation feedback to aid learning.
